original: // rab gnas kyi cho ga rnam par bsres pa gsum dang sbyar ba zhes bya ba bzhugs //
analyzed: rab gnas kyi cho ga rnam ba bsres ba gsum dang sbyor ba zhes byed ba bzhugs

analyzed: rgya gar skad du

analyzed: m+aa y+aa dz+wa la su pra tish+tha bi d+hi kra ma na ma

analyzed: bod skad du

analyzed: sgyu phrul d+r+wa ba rab tu gnas ba cho ga rim ba zhes byed ba

analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa la phyag tshal lo

analyzed: rdo rje dzin ba sku lnga bdag

analyzed: bras bu lhun grub du ma byed

analyzed: rig dzin rdo rje dzin ba la

analyzed: gnyis med rig ba bde ba dud

analyzed: sgyu phrul d+r+wa ba dkyil khor du

analyzed: ji ltar dul ba gang zag la

analyzed: de yi cho ga shes byed phyir

analyzed: rab tu sku gsung thugs gnas ba mdor sdud chad

analyzed: sgyu gzhung don la gnyis las man ngag gi dgos ba

analyzed: phrul d+r+wa ba legs jug te

analyzed: dkyil khor la sogs thams cad la

analyzed: byin rlabs dbang skur byed ba phyir

analyzed: ji ltar rigs ba dag la jug gang gi gnas gang la gang dag dus

analyzed: dbang lnga rim ba thob ba dang dbang dang rab gnas kyi lung ldan las la lhag chad med

analyzed: ting dzin ye shes rkyen thub kun mkhas g.yo sgyu med

analyzed: ston ba rtags thob ting dzin drod ldan ba

analyzed: ji ltar s ba sdud ba byed

analyzed: dkyil khor glegs bam rdo rje dril

analyzed: bum ba mchod rten la sogs ba

analyzed: de lta de ltar dpyod ba byed

analyzed: nya dang brgyad dang stong la sogs
